CustomField.description: A score of 0-5 that simply indicates how many of the Google Analytics Campaign parameters were captured from the URL the visitor clicked on.
CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK( cloudamp__GA_Campaign__c ) , 0, 1) + IF( ISBLANK( cloudamp__GA_Content__c ) , 0, 1) + IF( ISBLANK( cloudamp__GA_Medium__c ) , 0, 1) + IF( ISBLANK( cloudamp__GA_Source__c ) , 0, 1) + IF( ISBLANK( cloudamp__GA_Term__c ) , 0, 1)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A score of 0-5 that simply indicates how many of the Google Analytics Campaign parameters were captured from the URL the visitor clicked on.
CustomField.label: GA Tracker Score
